children.Text: WPF Test Application - Enhanced Controls Testing
This fills the remaining space in the DockPanel

This is a multi-line TextBox.
You can enter multiple lines of text here.
It supports word wrapping and scrolling.
This enhanced WPF application is used to test the WpfInspector injection with various controls.
2. Note the Process ID displayed in the Basic Controls tab
3. Run the Injector with this Process ID: Injector.exe [ProcessId]
4. The injector should inject WpfInspector and receive a "PONG" response to its "PING"
5. Test various controls across different tabs to verify inspection capabilities
Ready for injection testing with enhanced WPF controls...
